sprache.gs_add: Adicionar servidor etapa 1: Usuário, Servidor, Jogos
sprache.heading_template: Visão geral do servidor de jogos
sprache.help_calendar:
You can define game server restarts at the top of every hour with our restart planner.
This feature is helpful if you want to switch the game or the template at a given time.
sprache.help_config:
Our web interface allows you to edit the most important config files for your game server. Config files belonging to plugins will be added once they have been installed with the web interface.

It might be that you cannot see the config file in the web interface, in this case you can edit it via FTP even so.
sprache.help_md: On this site you can change games at any time. Specifically, our Template feature allows you to maintain multiple game configurations.
sprache.help_list:
This overview lists detailed game server information, for example, the active template, FTP data, etc. The submenus will allow you to do extensive configuration changes.
Games and templates can be defined at Settings. The Server configs area will allow you to manage game and addon settings. If you want to automatically change a game or template, the Restart planner will be of great use for you. Troubleshooting can be done with the Logs.
sprache.help_reinstall:
Resynchronization will add missing files without altering existing ones. You could benefit from this feature when you have deleted files by accident or new update files are absent.

Reinstall will result in a complete reset. All data will be lost, and the server will be reset to factory defaults.

Both actions are started with the Execute button and usually completed within a few minutes.

sprache.import_start: O serviço de migração começou. Este processo levará algum tempo!
